articles.title: Lia Thomas eliminated from NCAA Woman of the Year award contention - Washington Examiner
articles.description: The NCAA has announced a biological woman as the Ivy League conference representative to compete for Woman of the Year honors over Lia Thomas, the transgender athlete who made headlines after leaving men's swimming to compete against women.
